title: The Door of No Return: The History of Cape Coast Castle and the Atlantic Slave Trade
description: Called one of the best books of the year by The Economist, the London Times, and Publishers Weekly, this is the gripping history of Cape Coast Castle in Ghana, the African headquarters of the British slave trade for nearly one hundred and fifty yearsâ€”until the legal trade was abolished in 1807.
author: William St. Clair
